00020 #ifndef CO_NODETYPE_H
00021 #define CO_NODETYPE_H
00022 
00023 #include <iostream>
00024 
00025 namespace co
00026 {
00028     enum NodeType
00029     {
00030         NODETYPE_INVALID,         
00031         NODETYPE_NODE,            
00032         NODETYPE_USER = 0x100     
00033     };
00034 
00035     inline std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os, const NodeType& type )
00036     {
00037         return os << static_cast< unsigned >( type );
00038     }
00039 }
00040 
00041 #endif // CO_NODETYPE_H
